greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n) = 2 * Integral_{t>=0} T_n(t/2) * exp(-t) * dt, n>=0, where T_n(x) is n-th Chebyshev polynomial of first kind.
program: (PARI) { A300482(n) = if(n==0, return(2)); subst( serlaplace( 2*polchebyshev(n, 1, x/2)), x, 1); }
xref: Row m=0 in A300480 and A300481.
results.author: _Max Alekseyev_, Mar 06 2018
